title: Computer Graphics
description: Geometric constuctions; transformations; perception; reflection models; photorealistic; non-photorealistic, and image-based rendering; rendering software and API's; triangle-mesh processing; graphic acceleration; user-interaction, design and animation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and ((CS 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2261 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) or (ECE 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)) and (CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CS 2340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
